title: Selling: 2 1887 N172 Old Judges  stars SGC Graded

posts.post_title: Selling: 2 1887 N172 Old Judges  stars SGC Graded
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Misunderestimated (Brian H.)
220 for Denny and $210 for Pfeffer (Both for $410)
 -- shipping w/insurance and delivery confirmation included Paypal accepted without any additional charge.


First email to ME at:
bhodes@rcn.com
accepting these terms has priority.

If it matters I'm selling Jeremiah "Jerry" Denny because I confused him with Denny Lyons and Fred Pfeffer because he's in the Mayo set (I collect 19th century cards of players I find interesting for one reason or another). Denny, (Jerry, that is) was among the top 3rd baseman of the era and Fred Pfeffer was among the top 2nd basemen of the era and a mainstay for the Anson-led Chicago White Stockings (NKA -- the Cubs) . 
----------
* edited to clarify that Pfeffer is in the Mayo set -- not Lyons
 edited second time to reflect new pricing
* edited third time because (as someone graciously notified me) I confused Jerry Denny with Denny Lyons (again).
